com.jb.couponsystem.repo

Interface CouponRepo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Coupon,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Coupon,java.lang.Long>

    public interface CouponRepo
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Coupon,java.lang.Long>
    This interface contains query methods that refer to the coupon objects in the database.
    Author:
    Alexander Zablotsky

    • Method Summary

      This method finds and returns company's coupon in the database by its ID and company ID received as parameters from the outside.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> findByMaxEndDateAndCompanyId(java.util.Date endDate, long companyId)
      This method finds and returns company's coupons in the database the end date of which is before the given end date.

      This method finds and returns company's coupons in the database the price of which is lower than the given price.

    • Method Detail

      • existsByTitle

        @Query(value="SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(c) > 0 THEN \'true\' ELSE \'false\' END FROM COUPONS c WHERE c.title = :title")
boolean existsByTitle(@Param(value="title")
                                                                                                                                            java.lang.String title)
        This method checks if a coupon with a given title exists in the database. It returns true if it exists, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        title - coupon title
        Returns:
        true if a coupon with a given title exists, false otherwise

      • anyCouponsExist

        @Query(value="SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(c) > 0 THEN \'true\' ELSE \'false\' END FROM COUPONS c")
boolean anyCouponsExist()

      • existsByIdAndCompanyId

        @Query(value="SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(c) > 0 THEN \'true\' ELSE \'false\' END FROM COUPONS c WHERE c.id = :id AND  c.company.id = :companyId")
boolean existsByIdAndCompanyId(@Param(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                              long id,
                                                                                                                                                                              @Param(value="companyId")
                                                                                                                                                                              long companyId)
        This method checks if a coupon with a given id and company id exists in the database. It returns true if it exists, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        id - coupon ID
        companyId - company ID
        Returns:
        if a coupon with a given id and company id exists, false otherwise

      • removeCouponById

        @Transactional
 @Modifying
 @Query(value="DELETE FROM COUPONS c WHERE c.id = :id")
void removeCouponById(@Param(value="id")
                                                                                                            long id)
        This method deletes coupon from the database. The coupon is found by its ID received as a parameter from the outside.
        Parameters:
        id - coupon ID

      • removeCouponByIdAndCompanyId

        @Transactional
 @Modifying

                                                                                                                                                       long id,
                                                                                                                                                       @Param(value="companyId")
                                                                                                                                                       long companyId)
        This method deletes company's coupon from the database. The coupon is found by its ID and company ID received as parameters from the outside.

        id - coupon ID
        companyId - company ID

      • findByMaxPriceAndCompanyId

        @Query(value="SELECT c FROM COUPONS c WHERE c.price <= :price AND  c.company.id = :companyId")
java.util.Collection<Coupon> findByMaxPriceAndCompanyId(@Param(value="price")
                                                                                                                                                        double price,
                                                                                                                                                        @Param(value="companyId")
                                                                                                                                                        long companyId)
        This method finds and returns company's coupons in the database the price of which is lower than the given price. Price and company ID are received as parameters from the outside.
        Parameters:
        price - maximal price of the coupon
        companyId - company ID
        Returns:
        collection of coupons

      • findByMaxEndDateAndCompanyId

        @Query(value="SELECT c FROM COUPONS c WHERE c.endDate <= :endDate AND  c.company.id = :companyId")
java.util.Collection<Coupon> findByMaxEndDateAndCompanyId(@Param(value="endDate")
                                                                                                                                                              java.util.Date endDate,
                                                                                                                                                              @Param(value="companyId")
                                                                                                                                                              long companyId)
        This method finds and returns company's coupons in the database the end date of which is before the given end date. End date and company ID are received as parameters from the outside.
        Parameters:
        endDate - maximal end date
        companyId - company ID
        Returns:
        collection of coupons

      • findCustomerCoupon

        @Query(value="SELECT coup FROM COUPONS coup WHERE coup.id = :couponId AND coup.id IN (SELECT coup.id FROM coup.customers c WHERE c.id = :customerId)")
Coupon findCustomerCoupon(@Param(value="customerId")
                                                                                                                                                                                  long customerId,
                                                                                                                                                                                  @Param(value="couponId")
                                                                                                                                                                                  long couponId)

        Parameters:
        customerId - customer ID
        couponId - coupon ID
        Returns:
        coupon object

      • findCustomerCouponsByType

        @Query(value="SELECT coup FROM COUPONS coup WHERE coup.id IN (SELECT coup.id FROM coup.customers c WHERE c.id = :customerId) AND coup.type = :type")
java.util.Collection<Coupon> findCustomerCouponsByType(@Param(value="customerId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                             long customerId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                             @Param(value="type")
                                                                                                                                                                                                             CouponType type)

        Parameters:
        customerId - customer ID
        type - coupon type
        Returns:
        collection of coupons

      • findCustomerCouponsByMaxPrice

        @Query(value="SELECT coup FROM COUPONS coup WHERE coup.id IN (SELECT coup.id FROM coup.customers c WHERE c.id = :customerId) AND coup.price <= :price")
java.util.Collection<Coupon> findCustomerCouponsByMaxPrice(@Param(value="customerId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    long customerId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    @Param(value="price")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    double price)

        customerId - customer ID
        price - coupon price
        Returns:
        collection of coupons
